definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to pretend to be (asleep etc)/to disguise oneself as/pretense/disguise/(military) to camouflage/camouflage
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to disprove/to confirm (sth) to be false

sentences.english: In computer communications, the pseudo - random code technique is used for recognition.
sentences.chinese: 在计算机通讯中，可采用伪随机码技术来进行识别。

sentences.english: In chapter 1, a difference scheme of some two-dimensional linear pseudo-parabolic equation is concerned.
sentences.chinese: 第一章中讨论了二维线性伪抛物型方程的差分格式。

sentences.english: One such surface is known as the pseudosphere.
sentences.chinese: 一个这样的曲面名为伪球面。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the anti-fatigue action of pseudo-ginsenoside GQ.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨伪人参皂苷GQ抗运动性疲劳的功效。

sentences.english: We can only supply you with 20000 yards of pure silk.
sentences.chinese: 咱们只能供给二万码的伪丝绸。

sentences.english: The pseudo random noise ranging code has been applied extensively to spread spectrum communications.
sentences.chinese: 伪随机码在扩频通信中得到广泛应用。
这是一个似是而非的伪问题。
消色差和伪彩色全息图。

sentences.english: The third iteration might define the intra-module pseudo-code.
sentences.chinese: 第三个迭代则定义模块内部的伪代码。

sentences.english: I think I finally found a better piace to start.
sentences.chinese: 俄以伪终于找到新开始的方向。

sentences.english: We use a simplified pseudocode to reduce programming language "clutter".
sentences.chinese: 我们使用简化的伪代码来减少编程语言“簇”。

sentences.english: This article outlined the recent progresses in the research on pseudorabies .
sentences.chinese: 本文概述了近年来关于伪狂犬病的研究进展。

sentences.english: Pseudo-Riemannian Lie algebras in dimension 4 are classified.
sentences.chinese: 给出了四维伪黎曼李代数的分类。

sentences.english: Some of these hoaxes will be put together into a pseudo-haiku news conference.
sentences.chinese: 一些恶作剧者将这些俳句拼凑成一个伪新闻发布会。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pseudo-ginsenoside CQ showed fairly strong function of anti-fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 结论伪人参皂苷GQ显示出较强的抗疲劳作用。

sentences.english: Pseudo-Control Compensation cancel the interaction between the actuator and the adaptive factor.
sentences.chinese: 伪控制补偿消除作动器和自适应单元之间的交互影响。

definition: lit. from head to tail (idiom); thoroughgoing/through and through/out and out/from top to bottom
genuine goods at fair prices/(fig.) genuine/real/true
Zhengtong Emperor, reign name of sixth Ming Emperor Zhu Qizhen 朱祁鎮|朱祁镇[Zhu1 Qi2 zhen4] (1427-1464), reigned 1435-1449, Temple name Yingzong 英宗[Ying1 zong1]
in the middle of the road/to be in the way/to hold power/(fig.) to predominate/to be in vogue
to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
to sink down to/to be reduced to (sth inferior)
